content: boo-boo the baby ghost is a free c2c corner to corner crochet pillow pattern on my blog this fun pillow is beginner-friendly and so quick to make you will begin by making a large corner to corner square basically a square blanket once the square is complete you will attach to your 12″ round pillow insert no need for stuffing on this one this is not a typical pillow cover in that the crochet square flows around the pillow the pillow is essentially a prop add crocheted eyes to the front of your pillow to complete boo-boo very easy and absolutely adorable
